content.query:
Declare @schemaname as VARCHAR(max) = 'COB',
 @tablename as varchar(max) = 'vwEmployee2'


   if ((select count(*) from sys.views s where s.name = @tablename) = 1 ) 
    BEGIN
        declare @dropsql nvarchar(max) = 
        'DROP VIEW ' +  @schemaname + '.' + @tablename
        --print (@dropsql)
         exec sp_executesql @tsql = @dropsql
    END


select * from sys.procedures

exec selectEmployees
